1. Ubisoft Mainz Dev Details Some of Anno 117: Pax Romana’s New Features  Game Rant
  2. Anno 117 Pax Romana hands-on: Gorgeous, deep, and tricky to learn  Ars Technica
  3. New Ubisoft RTS game is a lot more than just Cities Skylines 2 in Rome  PCGamesN
  4. As the follow-up to one of the greatest city builders, Anno 117: Pax Romana has a big toga to fill, and I think it might deliver the goods  PC Gamer
  5. Anno 117: Pax Romana is aiming to be a more flexible, distinctly Roman management game  Rock Paper Shotgun

item.title: GTA 6 Exec Suggests No More Delays, Says Recent Push Is Less Than 6 Months - GameSpot
item.description:
1. GTA 6 Exec Suggests No More Delays, Says Recent Push Is Less Than 6 Months  GameSpot
  2. GTA 6 Development Began 'In Earnest' in 2020 Following the 'Massive Success' of Red Dead Redemption 2, Take-Two Says  IGN
  3. GTA 6 Delay Could Wipe Out A Jaw-Dropping Amount Of Money From Global Games Industry  GameSpot
  4. Latest ‘GTA VI’ Delay Will Cost Gaming Business $2.7 Billion in 2025  The Hollywood Reporter
  5. GTA 6 will arrive "with no limitations" thanks to its latest delay  PCGamesN
